curriculumArray.curriculumTitle: Learn at your own pace with hands-on creative classes.
curriculumArray.curriculumDescription: Looking to expand your skills and explore your creativity? Your hands-on creative classes are the perfect way to learn at your own pace and discover new talents.

curriculumArray.curriculumTitle: CourseCo teachers are everyday creatives and professionals who want to share their passion
curriculumArray.curriculumDescription: At CourseCo, we believe that everyone has something to teach and  share with the world. Our teachers are not just experts in their field, they are also passionate about teaching and helping others discover their own creativity. They take the time    to get to know their students and tailor their instruction to meet their individual needs and goals.
